summary.span: 指定作为外键列显示在被引用表中的列。

span.span: Specifies the column that is displayed in the referred table as a foreign-key column.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当表中的列包含外键时，动态数据推断该被引用表中的列的显示值。When a column in a table contains a foreign key, Dynamic Data infers the display value for that column from the referenced table. 默认情况下，使用其类型为字符串 （或文本） 被引用表的第一列。By default, the first column of the referenced table whose type is string (or text) is used. 属性，可以更改此默认行为并指定一个不同的父表列使用列作为外键字段。The attribute enables you to change this default behavior and to specify a different parent table column to use as the column for the foreign key field. 当应用此属性时，你必须遵循以下的使用限制：When you apply this attribute, you must adhere to the following usage constraints: - 该属性只能应用于类。The attribute can only be applied to a class. - 该属性可以由派生类继承。The attribute can be inherited by derived classes. - 特性可以应用只进行一次。The attribute can be applied only one time. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 特性。The following example shows how to use the attribute. 该示例执行以下任务：The example performs the following tasks: - 实现元数据的分部类地址和客户表，作为 CustomerAddress 表的父表。Implements metadata partial classes for the Address and Customer tables, which are parent tables for the CustomerAddress table. - 适用属性设为`Address`元数据分部类，以指定下列各项：Applies the attribute to the `Address` metadata partial class to specify the following: - 地址表 （父表） 中的城市列显示为 CustomerAddress 子表中的外键列。The City column from the Address table (the parent table) is displayed as the foreign-key column in the CustomerAddress child table. - 地址表 （父表） 中的 PostalCode 列用于排序的地址选择框中 CustomerAddress 子表。The PostalCode column from the Address table (the parent table) is used for sorting the Address selection box in the CustomerAddress child table. - 排序顺序设置为升序。The sort order is set to ascending. 该示例将应用属性设为`Customer`元数据分部类，以指定中的 LastName 列显示为 CustomerAddress 表的外键列。The example applies the attribute to the `Customer` metadata partial class to specify that the LastName column in displayed as the foreign-key column for the CustomerAddress table. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayColumnAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayColumnAttribute/CS/Address.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayColumnAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayColumnAttribute/VB/Address.vb#1)] 若要编译该示例，你需要以下各项：To compile the example, you need the following: - 任何版本的 Visual Studio 2010 或更高版本。Any edition of Visual Studio 2010 or later. - AdventureWorksLT 示例数据库。The AdventureWorksLT sample database. 有关如何下载和安装 SQL Server 示例数据库的信息，请参阅[Microsoft SQL Server 产品示例： 数据库](https://github.com/Microsoft/sql-server-samples/releases)GitHub 上。For information about how to download and install the SQL Server sample database, see [Microsoft SQL Server Product Samples: Database](https://github.com/Microsoft/sql-server-samples/releases) on GitHub. 请确保安装版本的正在运行的 SQL Server 示例数据库的正确版本。Make sure that you install the correct version of the sample database for the version of SQL Server that you are running. - 动态数据驱动的网站。A dynamic data-driven Web site. 这使您可以创建数据库的数据上下文，并创建包含要自定义的数据字段的类。This enables you to create a data context for the database and to create the class that contains the data field to customize. 有关详情，请参阅`Walkthrough: Creating a New Dynamic Data Web Site using Scaffolding`。For more information, see `Walkthrough: Creating a New Dynamic Data Web Site using Scaffolding`.
